game.name: Hentai Age Vacation
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A calm, magical puzzle game where each completed stage reveals a beautiful portrait. Arrange tiles at your own pace—no timers, no pressure—just relaxing gameplay with soothing visuals
game.shortDescriptionEn: A calm, magical puzzle game where each completed stage reveals a beautiful portrait. Arrange tiles at your own pace—no timers, no pressure—just relaxing gameplay with soothing visuals
